attributes.action: The Public Sector should take their pensions medicine like the rest of us in the private sector
attributes.additional_details: I work in the private sector and have seen pension after pension be cut in companies reflecting the current crisis in Pensions.  This petition is for private sector workers to show the lack of support public sector workers have in striking.  I have no political affiliations and did hold a public sector pension once but now have a money purchase scheme.
